cause.description:
Psoriasis is a debilitating disease that can cause unbelieveable pain and disfigurement.
Please watch the video below to know what it is like.
http://www.realhealth.tv/?goto=6&vid=118&vo=5
1. Psoriasis patients have a right to treatment
2. Psoriasis patients have the right to the best treatment available
3. We have the right to be able to use any facilities that non-psoriasis people.
cause.mission: To help people with psoriasis get the treatment we need.
cause.name: Help stop psoriasis
